characteristics.title: Emotional Rollercoaster
characteristics.description: Do you feel things way more intensely than others? Does it take forever to calm down after you get upset?

characteristics.title: Impulsive Actions
characteristics.description: Do you struggle with impulsive behavior when feeling strong emotions? Turn to risky behaviors to cope?

characteristics.title: Negative Thoughts
characteristics.description: Are you stuck in extreme thinking patterns, like thinking no one will like you or you'll never succeed?

characteristics.title: Self-Hate
characteristics.description: Are you your own worst critic? Do you assume you're unlovable or feel like a burden on others?

characteristics.title: Distorted Thinking
characteristics.description: Do you think in black-and-white ways? Imagine people talking about you behind your back?

characteristics.title: Relationship Struggles
characteristics.description: Are your relationships chaotic? Terrified of people leaving you? Go from loving to hating quickly?

characteristics.title: Lost and Empty
characteristics.description: Do you feel disconnected? Unsure who you are? Take on others' emotions? Sometimes feel unreal?
